resources.string: Click the + button to add friends
Are you sure you want to remove this summoner from your friends list?
Are you sure you want to trigger a stats update? You can only do this once per hour.
You have recently triggered a stats update and need to wait longer before you can do so again.
No stats were found. Swipe down to retrieve the newest stats.
You have no friends to compare stats with!
Cannot add yourself as a friend
